    • Field Detail

      • setTunnel

        public java.lang.Boolean setTunnel
        set this value to true if tunnel is to be set

        Default value: false

      • isAutheticationKeyBased

        public java.lang.Boolean isAutheticationKeyBased
        set this value to true if connection to server is key based

        Default value: false

      • isConnected

        public java.lang.Boolean isConnected
        True if connected to the server else false

      • printOnConsole

        public java.lang.Boolean printOnConsole
        set this value to true if the script output is to be printed on System.out stream

        Default value: false

      • consolidated_output

        public static java.lang.StringBuffer consolidated_output

        Script output of all the scripts is appended to this string buffer

        this can be used to search some string from the output of previous scripts

        Returns:
        The location of the key file for key based authentication

        Returns:
        String that is set to check in the script output while execution

        public int getLocalport()
        Returns:
        The local port on which tunneling is set to the remote server

      • setHostname

        public void setHostname(java.lang.String hostname)
        Sets the host-name of the server

      • setPort

        public void setPort(int port)
        Sets the port of the server to be connected

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(java.lang.String password)

        Sets the password of the server

        Not applicable for key based authentication

      • setPassphrase

        public void setPassphrase(java.lang.String passphrase)

        Sets the passphrase for key based authentication

        Applicable only if user's key contains passphrase

      • setRemotePort

        public void setRemotePort(int remotePort)
        Sets the remote port of the server for which tunneling is to be set

      • setKeyFileLocation

        public void setKeyFileLocation(java.lang.String keyFileLocation)

        Sets the key file location for key based authentication

        Provide the absolute path with filename

        If ppk files do not work then use OpenSSH format key (Convert with puttyGen)

      • setOutputFolder

        public void setOutputFolder(java.lang.String outputFolder)
        Sets the output folder for script execution output

      • setTunnelRemoteHost

        public void setTunnelRemoteHost(java.lang.String tunnelRemoteHost)
        Sets the remote host of the server for which tunneling is to be set

      • setErrorCheckString

        public void setErrorCheckString(java.lang.String errorCheckString)

        Sets the errorcheck string which is to be checked in the output of the script execution

        If the set string is found in the output of the script then ScriptExecutionFailureException is thrown

      • setTIMEOUT_VALUE

        public void setTIMEOUT_VALUE(int TIMEOUT_VALUE)

      • setUsername

        public void setUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Sets the username of the server to be connected

      • setLocalport

        public void setLocalport(int localport)

        Sets the localport for the tunneling to be set

        By default tunneling is set on the local port 10900

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        Connects to the SSH server
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException

      • executeScript

        public void executeScript(java.lang.String path,
                          java.lang.String ScriptName)
                   throws ScriptExecutionFailureException,
                          java.io.IOException,
                          com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        Executes the shell script on the server
        Parameters:
        path - Path where the shell script is placed
        ScriptName - File name of the shell script to be executed
        Throws:
        ScriptExecutionFailureException - If the script output contains the error check string OR if the output folder is not defined
        java.io.IOException - If the script file not present
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException

      • uploadToServer

        public void uploadToServer(java.lang.String Source,
                           java.lang.String Destination)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException,
                           com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException,
                           ScriptExecutionFailureException
        Uploads the file/folder to server
        Parameters:
        Source - Source file/folder to be uploaded
        Destination - Server destination where the file is to be uploaded
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If source file not present
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        ScriptExecutionFailureException

                               java.lang.String Destination)
                        throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException,
                               com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        Downloads file from server
        Parameters:
        Source - Server Source file/folder to be downloaded
        Destination - Destination where file/folder is to be downloaded
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException

      • renameServerFile

        public void renameServerFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                             java.lang.String oldName,
                             java.lang.String newName)
                      throws com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException,
                             com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        Renames the server file
        Parameters:
        filePath - Server path where the file to be renamed is to be located
        oldName - Original name of the file to be renamed
        newName - New name of the file
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException

      • removeFromServer

        public void removeFromServer(java.lang.String filePath,
                             java.lang.String fileOrFolderName)
                      throws com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException,
                             com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
        Removes the file / folder folder from the server
        Parameters:
        filePath - Server path from where the file is to be deleted
        fileOrFolderName - File/folder name to be deleted
        Throws:
        com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
        com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException
